project.description: Before doing any test, need check related devices are online or not. #Trigger command curl -X POST "http://voltha:11777ff9b4b53d3b0ed4eb08b206214c9e@172.17.10.64:8080/job/0_Check_Test_Environment/buildWithParameters?PLTFORM=asgvolt64&ONL_ID=b4af32e&PSME_VER=2.1.3.59.24&BAL_SDK_VER=3.2.2.2&MDATE=$MDATE"

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash echo "ONL_COMMIT_ID[$ONL_ID]" echo "PLTFORM[$PLTFORM]" echo "PSME_VER[$PSME_VER]" echo "BAL_SDK_VER[$BAL_SDK_VER]" echo "MDATE[$MDATE]"
exit 0

#!/bin/bash
IPS=("172.17.8.130" "172.17.8.116" "172.17.9.146" "172.17.10.60" "172.17.10.64" "172.17.8.195") # PI 1 eth1 #JasoNano eth1 #TFTP Server #Listner Server #Build Server #5812 Mgmt intf count="${#IPS[@]}"
for (( c=0; c < "${count}"; c++ )) do IP=${IPS[$c]} echo "ping IP[$IP]"
COUNT=1 RES=`ping $IP -c $COUNT -W 1 | grep '64 bytes from' | wc -l` if [ $RES == $COUNT ];then echo "ping $IP OK!!!!!"
else echo "$IP cannot access!!!!!!!" exit 1 fi done echo "TEST EVN. OK!!!!!"

org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
#!/bin/bash export PATH='/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin';export;onie-nos-install LINKSTATUS=`acc_sw 'ps' | grep '( 47)' | awk -F " " '{print $3}'`
if [ "$LINKSTATUS" == "up" ];then echo "AS5812 port 47 LINK UP !!" else echo "AS5812 port 47 LINK DOWN!!" exit 1 fi
LINKSPEED=`acc_sw 'ps' | grep '( 47)' | awk -F " " '{print $4}'` if [ "$LINKSPEED" == "1G" ];then echo "AS5812 port 47 1G SPEED OK!!" else echo "AS5812 port 47 1G SPEED NO CORRECT!!" exit 1 fi
LINKSTATUS=`acc_sw 'ps' | grep '( 49)' | awk -F " " '{print $3}'`
if [ "$LINKSTATUS" == "up" ];then echo "AS5812 port 49 LINK UP !!" else # This port only link up while SDK start , need check after SDK up. echo "AS5812 port 49 LINK DOWN!!" fi
LINKSPEED=`acc_sw 'ps' | grep '( 49)' | awk -F " " '{print $4}'` if [ "$LINKSPEED" == "40G" ];then echo "AS5812 port 49 40G SPEED OK!!" else echo "AS5812 port 49 40G SPEED NO CORRECT!!" fi
